mapper.select: { CALL BD_TRAMITE_CERO_PAPEL.PKG_TRAMITE_CERO_PAPEL.USP_CP_GET_REGISTRO( #{idRegistro, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{idExpediente, mode=OUT, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{txtDescripcionTramite, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fecRegistroTramite, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fecEnvioTramite, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCiudadano, mode=OUT, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{codEestaTrami, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flgDeclaracionJurada, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codEorgano, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desOrganoDocumento, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) }

{ CALL BD_TRAMITE_CERO_PAPEL.PKG_TRAMITE_CERO_PAPEL.USP_CP_INSERT_REGISTRO( #{idExpediente, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{txtDescripcionTramite, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fecRegistroTramite, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCiudadano, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{codTestaTrami, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{codEestaTrami, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flgDeclaracionJurada, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codTorgano, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{codEorgano, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idSesionReg, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{idSesionMod, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{idRegistro, mode=OUT, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{numeroCeroPapel, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultado, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) }
